title: Pixel 3 Microphone issue
content:
New phone 2 days old, was working fine until my microphone stopped picking up audio when placing a call or when using Google assistant. Seems that there's been a few people that have had this issue,  I've tried multiple fixes but nothing seems to remedy the microphone issue. 
I've tried:

Cleaning the microphone opening
Restarting in safe mode 
Doing a hard reset 
Using 4G/WIFI/3G- All had the same results
updating everything to the latest version
Using a bluetooth headset.

The funny thing is that the microphone picks things up perfectly when using apps such as Snapchat and when taking videos. Not sure if it's a software related issue but it's rather frustrating. 

Looking for any advice.
